entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mac Catalyst Webview very low frame rate #21412
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21411
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [Testing] Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21410
    .NET 8 SR4
  • XA1018 Specified AndroidManifest #21406
  • very High Load time in Bindable Layout with vertical Stack Layout #21405
  • Memory Leak on back and Fro navigation on page where Custom control and complex View Page #21404
  • Memory Leak on Page Navigation while removing the page. #21403
  • Add Padding to CollectionView #21402

Closed

  • [iOS-Release] CommunityToolkit-MAUI: Showing Toast Crashes #21407

PullRequests

Created

  • Still measure children if size is known on CV #21409

Updated

  • [macOS] Make window overlay to redraw correctly during window resizing #21371
    community ✨
  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Testing] Added specific actions by platform #21330
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Revert "[iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse (#14… #21400
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
